category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 19 (Facility Usage Fee)
contents: Article 19 (Facility Use Fee) ① The athlete village head collects facility use fees from temporary users, and the facility use fees are determined separately. ② The athlete village head may exempt part or all of the facility usage fee in the following cases. Revised 2020. 10. 23. 1. Official event invited by the Sports Association 2. Official sports-related event hosted by the Sports Association member organizations and city/provincial branches
